name: The Maître D'
description:
As the Maître D' at a fancy French brasserie, it's your job to ensure patrons encounter the best service imaginable. Worm your way in with the hoity-toity by showing them their seats!

Get more FREE GAMES by us at Powerhoof.itch.io!

Created by SeaDads (our sweet game jam team):

  • Barney Cumming (@Powerhoof): Art
  • Dave Lloyd (@DuzzOnDrums): Code + Foley/SFX
  • Jon Murphy (@NuclearFriend): Code
  • Paul Dal Pozzo: Level Design
  • Louis Meyer (@LouisDMeyer): Music
  • Adrian Vaughan (@YeOldShrimpEyes): Voices

Watch the making of video

Originally created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 35. Theme: Shapeshifter
